slide_content_8:
Indonesian game developers are growing. One of the games from Indonesia that is ready to color your day is the Higgs Domino Topbos game which is an online domino game. This exciting game is available on the Play Store and App Store and is available for free.

There are various types of games in one Higgs Domino application. You can choose a game to play in your spare time. If you are bored with the game, just choose and play other games in the same application. No need to download another game application anymore.

Unfortunately, even though this game is available for free on the Play Store and App Store, there are still in-app purchases you need to make to get certain items in the Higgs Domino game. Many players finally decide to use a game that has been modified.

This is because the modified Higgs Domino game promises more complete features and all items in it are available for free and can be used without having to pay or buy anything. Players with limited funds usually prefer the modified version.

One Application That Contains Many Types of Games

This cool local game is indeed called Higgs Domino, but it's not just a domino game that you can find in the Higgs Domino Topbos application. There are various types of games that are ready to be played. You can see these various games on the main page of the Higgs Domino application.

The developer of this game has equipped the Higgs Domino application with a wide selection of games so that each player never feels bored playing this game. Below are a wide selection of games that you can play when you're not busy and want to fill your spare time:
slide_content_9:
The first game that you will definitely find in the Higgs Domino Topbos application is the domino gaple game. In this game, there will be 28 dominoes distributed to a maximum of 4 players. Players who get log 6 can start this game.

The next player must connect and follow the cards that are already on the board. For example, a card that starts with a range of 6-6 can be followed by a 6-5, 5-3, 3-1 and so on. The player who has run out of cards is the player who wins the game.

Each player of this domino gaple game will get 6 cards to play. The game is usually played clockwise. if it turns out that no one has run out of cards, then the winner is the player with the lowest number of cards and the loser is the one with the highest number.
slide_content_10:
The next domino game that you can find in the Higgs Domino application is domino 99 or domino qiu qiu. This game is included in the traditional domino game which is very exciting. Even though you rely on hockey or luck, you still need to understand how to play it.

This game can be played by 2 to 6 players. Each player will get 4 cards that must be combined to form 2 pairs of values. The player who is able to create the combination with the highest score is the winner.

For example, if you want to make domino series 1, then you have to collect 6 cards, each of which has logs of 1 on one side. Or if you want to make a domino series 2 combination, the five cards you collect must have logs of 2 on one side.
slide_content_11:
There are also other poker card games that can be played on the Higgs Domino Topbos app. This game is named 41 because each player must manage to collect cards that total 41 points. This amount can be met by collecting Ace, King, Queen, and Jack cards of the same suit.

For example, you need to collect aces, kings, queens, and jacks that are heart-shaped. If one of the cards has a different shape, the different cards cannot be counted along with the other 3 cards. Ace alone has 11 points while the other 3 cards have 10 points.

If you manage to collect the same card by getting 41 points, you have won the game. The game will also automatically end if there are no cards in the deck that can be taken by the players.
slide_content_12:
If you don't want to play domino games anymore, there is a playing card game that you can play at Higgs Domino Topbos. One of the playing card games that can be played is the hoe game. To play this game, one of the four players must discard one card.

Then the other players can discard other cards according to the order of the rounds. If the player who got the turn to throw the card does not have a suitable card, the player must hoe or in other words take the card that is in the deck.

The player must continue to hoe until he can find a card that matches the card that was discarded by the previous player. The player who wins the game is the one who can finish the cards in his hand.
slide_content_13:
Want to be nostalgic for the games when you were a kid? Download the Higgs Domino Topbos application and play the game that you must have often played as a child, namely the Ludo game. This game is exactly the same as a children's board game, only online.

In this game, you can play Ludo along with 3 other Higgs Domino players online. Like the original game, you'll be playing with several pawns and have to get them all out of the drum in order to get to the center of the board before the rest of the players.

This game relies heavily on luck. If you are unlucky the pawns you move can be eaten by other players' pawns, so they return to the drum and you have to repeat the steps from the beginning. This is very annoying, especially when the pawn is very close to the center.
slide_content_14:
Then there is another board game that is just as unique as the Ludo game, namely the Dam game. This game can also be played immediately after you install the Higgs Domino Topbos application. This board game only requires 2 players.

You and your opponent need to move pawns of different colors, namely black and white pawns. To be able to win the Dam game and defeat your opponent, you must have a precise strategy to corner the pawns so they don't have a move to move again.

Or you can also continue to eat your opponent's pawns so that your opponent will run out of pawns and eventually lose. To be able to eat the opponent's pawn, your pawn must move crosswise. Practice your skills to play this unique game in the Higgs Domino app.
slide_content_15:
Love numbers games like Sudoku? Then you will really like the Crazy Numbers game in the Higgs Domino application. This Crazy Numbers game displays numbers starting with the smallest 2, followed by 4, 8, 16, 32, 64, 128, 256, and so on.

You must combine two blocks that have the same value. First, combine two block 2s to make a block 4. Then combine block 4 with another block 4 to make a block 8. Continue until you get the block with the highest number.

The Crazy Numbers game in the Higgs Domino Topbos application will be finished if there is no more space available so you can no longer combine blocks with the same number. This game may be difficult to win but it will not make you feel bored.
